t: How Laura Ashley is capitalizing on its vintage creds to revive its brand | The Drum
s: November 24, 2023 - In 2020 Laura Ashley filed for bankruptcy – now the quintessential British textile brand is back and is leveraging its popularity in the vintage market to recruit a new generation of fans. Vice-president Poppy Marshall-Lawton shares her plans to build the brand back braver.

t: Laura Ashley Homeware – The Light Company
s: When it comes to homeware, we're all about Laura Ashley. We know what you're thinking: "Isn't that a clothing brand?" Well, yes and no. Laura Ashley is a British fashion and home decor line that has been around since the '50s, but they've recently gotten into the homeware business as well.

t: Laura Ashley Floats Into New Era After Marquee Brands Acquisition
s: January 6, 2025 - There could be a new lease of life for the floaty lady yet: following the acquisition of U.K. fashion and homewares brand Laura Ashley by New York-based Marquee Brands.
